mapper.sql: _ts, id, createtime, faev, baev, frev, brev, pt, pa, pb, pc, qt, qa, qb, qc, st, sa, sb, sc, pft, pfb, pfa, pfc, va, vb, vc, ca, cb, cc, enf

last(_ts) as _ts, last(id) as id, last(createtime) as createtime, last(faev) as faev, last(baev) as baev, last(frev) as frev, last(brev) as brev, last(pt) as pt, last(pa) as pa, last(pb) as pb, last(pc) as pc, last(qt) as qt, last(qa) as qa, last(qb) as qb, last(qc) as qc, last(st) as st, last(sa) as sa, last(sb) as sb, last(sc) as sc, last(pft) as pft, last(pfb) as pfb, last(pfa) as pfa, last(pfc) as pfc, last(va) as va, last(vb) as vb, last(vc) as vc, last(ca) as ca, last(cb) as cb, last(cc) as cc, last(enf) as enf
